archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Define & Maintain Metric Dimension Specifications
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Define grouping (categories, dimensions) and dependencies (including hierarchies) of a Metric with respect to other Metrics.

properties.value: Metric Dimension Specification defines and maintains for each Metric: categories (organizational or technical classifications), dimensions (time, space, user groups, priority levels, â€¦), cross-references, dependencies, and tree hierarchies which characterize the Metric with respect to other Metrics.
